GSD.product_version: versions from v3.5 to before v5.15.46
GSD.description:
ASoC: mxs-saif: Fix refcount leak in mxs_saif_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 24491124406666bf0dcb9ee10c5575c6ce6a1730, it was introduced in version v3.5 by commit 08641c7c74dddfcd726512edfaa3b4cbe42e523e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ASoC: mxs-saif: Fix refcount leak in mxs_saif_probe
